variables.input:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`
| fields tags
| summarize tags = collectDistinct(tags)

0.title: PaloAlto firewall
0.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.cpu.management.utilization`), t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.sys.uptime`), by: {`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device` | fields id, SystemName, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ SystemName,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=toLong(arrayAvg(`t_cpu`)), avg_upt=arrayAvg(`t_upt`)
| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.octets`), t_out=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.octets`), by:{ `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface)`} | summarize sum_out = sum(toDouble(t_out)), sum_in = sum(toDouble(t_in)), by: {`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
    fields:{sum_out, sum_in }
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,t_upt, interval, t_cpu
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| fieldsRemove avg_upt
| filter SystemName != "DUMSYS-10"
| fieldsAdd  `OutTraffic GB` = sum_out/1024/1024/1024, `InTraffic GB` = sum_in/1024/1024/1024
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = SystemName, `System Up Time` = DurSys ,`CPU (%)` = avg_cpu, `Last seen` = `lifetime[end]`
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( `Last seen`  <  now() - 10m, "⚠️",else:"✅")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` , `CPU (%)`, `OutTraffic GB`, `InTraffic GB`

6.title: Cisco switches and routers
6.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`), t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.free`),  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.sys.uptime`), 
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end],entity.type ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]`, entity.type  }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`), avg_mem=arrayAvg(`t_mem`), avg_upt=arrayAvg(`t_upt`)
| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`), by:{ `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`} | summarize   sum_out = sum(toDouble(t_out)),sum_in = sum(toDouble(t_in)), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    fields:{sum_out, sum_in }  
| lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields Device = system_name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, system_name, sum_in, sum_out, avg_mem, avg_cpu
| fieldsRename `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| fieldsRemove avg_upt
| fieldsAdd  `OutTraffic GB` = sum_out/1024/1024/1024, `InTraffic GB` = sum_in/1024/1024/1024
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `System Up Time` = DurSys , `CPU (%)` = avg_cpu, `Free Memory (KB)` = avg_mem
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( lifetime <  now() -10m, "⚠️",else:"✅")
| fieldsAdd `Device type` = replaceString(type, "snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_", "")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` ,  `Problems #`, `CPU (%)`, `Free Memory (KB)`, `OutTraffic GB`, `InTraffic GB`
| filter `DNS name` != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| filter `Monitoring status` == "✅"

8.title: Interfaces in Up/Down state
8.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd description,type,  opStatus, adminStatus
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`] ,
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_system_name,Interface=description
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" AND adminStatus == "up(1)"
| append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd Name, Status,EnabledState
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`],
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_NodeName,Interface=Name,opStatus=Status,adminStatus=EnabledState
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(1)" AND adminStatus == "true(1)"]
//| fieldsAdd opStatus2 = "🟢 down(1)"
//| fieldsRename opStatus2 = "opStatus"

20.title: Top interfaces traffic
20.query:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`), t_ouo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_in=arrayAvg(`t_ino`),avg_out=arrayAvg(t_ouo)
| fieldsAdd `In GBytes`= tolong(avg_in/1024/1024/1024), `Out GBytes` = tolong(avg_out/1024/1024/1024)
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=description
| fieldsRemove timeframe, t_ino, t_ouo,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`, interval,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In GBytes`, `Out GBytes`

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.octets`), t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.octets`), by:{`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`}
| filter isNotNull(`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`)
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic_in= tolong(arraySum(t_ino)),sum_traffic_out= tolong(arraySum(t_outo))
|  fields `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`,sum_traffic_in,sum_traffic_out
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`| fields id,InterfaceDescription, runs_on[`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`]] ,
    sourceField: `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  InterfaceDescription, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`| fields id, SystemName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ SystemName } 
| filter SystemName != "DUMSYS-10"
| fieldsAdd `In GBytes`= tolong(sum_traffic_in/1024/1024/1024), `Out GBytes` = tolong(sum_traffic_out/1024/1024/1024)
| fieldsRemove `runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]` ,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = SystemName,Interface=InterfaceDescription
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In GBytes`, `Out GBytes`]

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`),  t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`),by: {`dt.entity.f5:interface`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`| fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsAdd avg_in=arrayAvg(`t_ino`),avg_out=arrayAvg(t_outo)
| fieldsAdd `In GBytes`= tolong(avg_in/1024/1024/1024), `Out GBytes` = tolong(avg_out/1024/1024/1024)
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_ino, t_outo,interval,`dt.entity.f5:interface`,`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` 
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = NodeName,Interface=Name
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In GBytes`, `Out GBytes`]
| sort `In GBytes`+ `Out GBytes` desc
| limit 10

21.title: Top interfaces discards and errors
21.query:
timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.discards`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.discards`),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.errors`),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.errors`),
by: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  type, timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`, interval,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=description
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors,sum_trouble
| append [timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.drops.in.count`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.drops.out.count`),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.errors.in.count`),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.errors.out.count`),
by: `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.f5:interface` | fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField: `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.f5:interface`, interval,  `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = NodeName,Interface=Name
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors,sum_trouble]
| sort sum_trouble desc
| fieldsRemove sum_trouble
| limit 10

23.title: Top interfaces Inbound traffic
23.query:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count` , rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove  type, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InLoad b/s` = t_ino[]*8
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ino
| append [timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`, rate:1s), by: {`dt.entity.f5:interface`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`| fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsRemove  `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,`dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( Name,"-",NodeName ), `InLoad b/s` = t_ino[]*8
| fieldsRemove Name,NodeName, t_ino]
| sort `InLoad b/s` desc
| limit 10

24.title: Top interfaces Outbound traffic
24.query:
timeseries t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count` , rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove   `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `OutLoad` = t_outo[]*8
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_outo
| append [timeseries t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`, rate:1s), by: {`dt.entity.f5:interface`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`| fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsRemove  `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,`dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( Name,"-",NodeName ), `OutLoad` = t_outo[]*8
| fieldsRemove Name,NodeName, t_outo]
| sort `OutLoad` desc
| limit 10

25.title: Device CPU usage
25.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`),
by: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end] ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `CPU (%)` = t_cpu
| fieldsRemove entity.name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| sort `CPU (%)` desc
| filter in(`DNS name`,$Device)

29.title: Cisco router and switch temperature
29.query:
timeseries t_temp=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.temperature.status.value`),
by: { `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end] ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `Device Temperature` = t_temp
| fieldsRemove entity.name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, `lifetime[end]`
| sort `Device Temperature` desc
| limit 10

32.title: F5 BIG-IP load balancers
32.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.user1m`), t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.host.memory.used`),  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.uptime`), 
by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` | fields id, entity.name, NodeName, lifetime[end],entity.type ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,NodeName,`lifetime[end]`, entity.type  }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`), avg_mem=arrayAvg(`t_mem`), avg_upt=arrayAvg(`t_upt`)
| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`), by:{ `dt.entity.f5:instance`,`dt.entity.f5:interface`} | summarize   sum_out = sum(toDouble(t_out)),sum_in = sum(toDouble(t_in)), by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    fields:{sum_out, sum_in }
| fieldsRemove entity.name, timeframe, `dt.entity.f5:instance`,t_upt, interval, t_mem, t_cpu
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| fieldsRemove avg_upt
| filter NodeName != "ip-10-0-11-88.ec2.internal"
| fieldsAdd  `OutTraffic GB` = tolong(sum_out/1024/1024/1024), `InTraffic GB` = tolong(sum_in/1024/1024/1024)
| fieldsRename `Device type`= entity.type, `DNS name`= NodeName, `System Up Time` = DurSys , `CPU (%)` = avg_cpu, `Free Memory (KB)` = avg_mem, `Last seen` = `lifetime[end]`
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( `Last seen`  <  now() - 10m, "⚠️",else:"✅")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` , `CPU (%)`, `Free Memory (KB)`, `OutTraffic GB`, `InTraffic GB`


 // timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`), by:{ `dt.entity.f5:instance`,`dt.entity.f5:interface`}

36.title: Cisco routers and switches Fan  state
36.query:
timeseries t_fs=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.fan.state`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,envmon.fan.status,envmon.fan.descr}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name  
| fieldsAdd `Fan`=  if(envmon.fan.status   == "critical(3)" , "🔴" ,else:"🟢")
| fields `DNS name`, `Fan`

40.title: DEVICE UPTIME
40.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize down=count()
|append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize down=count()]
|append [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize down=count()]
//|append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`
//| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
//| summarize down=count()]
| summarize countdown=sum(down)
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( countdown == 0 , "🟢",else:"🔴")

41.title: TEMP. & FAN STATUS
41.query:
timeseries t_fs=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.fan.state`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,envmon.fan.status,envmon.fan.descr}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| filter envmon.fan.status ==  "critical(3)"   
| summarize critical=count()
| fieldsAdd `Hardware`=  if(critical==0,  "🟢",else: "🔴")

43.title: Device memory usage
43.query:
timeseries t_free=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.free`),t_used=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.used`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end] ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsadd `Used Memory (%)` = 100*(t_used[]/(t_free[]+ t_used[]))
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name
| fieldsRemove entity.name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, t_free, t_used
| sort `Used Memory (%)` desc
| filter in(`DNS name`,$Device)
| limit 10

44.title: TOTAL TRAFFIC - All Devices
44.query:
timeseries t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`),t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`)
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic= tolong(arraySum(t_in)+ arraySum(t_out))
|  fields sum_traffic
| append  [timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.octets`), t_out=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.octets`),by:{`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}
| filter `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`!= "CUSTOM_DEVICE-3ED25361DCBE9554"
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic= tolong(arraySum(t_in)+ arraySum(t_out))
|  fields sum_traffic]
| append  [timeseries  t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.bits`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.bits`)
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic= tolong(arraySum(t_in)+ arraySum(t_out))*8
|  fields sum_traffic]
| append  [timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`)
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic= tolong(arraySum(t_in)+ arraySum(t_out))
|  fields sum_traffic]
| summarize sum_traffic=sum(sum_traffic)

45.title: MONITORED DEVICES
45.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
//| append `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| append `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`
| summarize count()

46.title: OPEN DEVICE PROBLEMS
46.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems) 
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )
|append[fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
|append[fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
//|append[fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device` 
//| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
// [fetch events
//| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
//| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
//| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
//| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
| summarize countdown=sum(result)

47.title: UNRESPONSIVE DEVICES
47.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
//| append `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| append `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize count()

48.title: NODE INTERFACES UP/DOWN

51.title: Cisco routers and switches Fan  state
51.query:
timeseries t_fs=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.fan.state`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,envmon.fan.status,envmon.fan.descr}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name  
| fieldsAdd `Fan`=  if(envmon.fan.status   == "critical(3)" , "🔴" ,else:"🟢")
| fields `DNS name`, `Fan`

52.title: Generic network devices
52.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`), t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.free`),  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.sys.uptime`), 
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end],entity.type ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]`, entity.type  }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`), avg_mem=arrayAvg(`t_mem`), avg_upt=arrayAvg(`t_upt`)
| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`), by:{ `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`} | summarize   sum_out = sum(toDouble(t_out)),sum_in = sum(toDouble(t_in)), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    fields:{sum_out, sum_in }  
| lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields Device = system_name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, system_name, sum_in, sum_out, avg_mem, avg_cpu
| fieldsRename `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| fieldsRemove avg_upt
| fieldsAdd  `OutTraffic GB` = sum_out/1024/1024/1024, `InTraffic GB` = sum_in/1024/1024/1024
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `System Up Time` = DurSys , `CPU (%)` = avg_cpu, `Free Memory (KB)` = avg_mem
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( lifetime <  now() -10m, "⚠️",else:"✅")
| fieldsAdd `Device type` = replaceString(type, "snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_", "")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` ,  `Problems #`, `CPU (%)`, `Free Memory (KB)`, `OutTraffic GB`, `InTraffic GB`
| filter `DNS name` != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"

53.title: MONITORED DEVICES
53.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
//| append `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| append `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| append `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`
| summarize count()

54.title: Cisco router and switch temperatures

55.content:
## Networking Overview: 
- Don't forget to use the variables and timeframe selectors
